title: How to learn React Native
content: React Native is an open-source UI software framework created by Meta Platforms, Inc.[3] It is used to develop applications for Android,[4][5] Android TV,[6] iOS,[5] macOS,[7] tvOS,[8] Web,[9] Windows[7] and UWP[10] by enabling developers to use the React framework along with native platform capabilities.[11] It is also being used to develop virtual reality applications at Oculus.
author: osama hannan
